brand_color_description: Brand color for major navigational elements
brand_text_color_description: Brand color for hover and active states
text_color_description: Text color for body and heading elements
background_color_description: Background color of your Help Center
favicon_description: Icon displayed in the address bar of your browser
homepage_background_image_description: Hero image on the home page
community_background_image_description: Hero image on the community topics page
community_image_description: Image for the community section on the home page
search_placeholder_description: Placeholder text for the search field
categories_bg_color_description: Background color of the categories icon
facebook_url_description: URL to Facebook account. To hide this block fill '-' in text box.
twitter_url_description: URL to Twitter account. To hide this block fill '-' in text box.
google_plus_url_description: URL to Google account. To hide this block fill '-' in text box.
linkedin_url_description: URL to LinkedIn account. To hide this block fill '-' in text box.
pinterest_url_description: URL to Pinterest account. To hide this block fill '-' in text box.
instagram_url_description: URL to Instagram account. To hide this block fill '-' in text box.
youtube_url_description: URL to YouTube account. To hide this block fill '-' in text box.
dropdown1_description: To hide this menu item fill '-' in text box.
dropdown2_description: To hide this menu item fill '-' in text box.
dropdown3_description: To hide this menu item fill '-' in text box.
dropdown4_description: To hide this menu item fill '-' in text box.

menu_color_description: Color of the header links and text
